Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near 14th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near the area of 14th due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near the area of 14th due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
